name: vscode-w3cvalidation
description: Adds W3C validation support to Visual Studio Code.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.compile: tsc -p client/tsconfig.json && cd server && npm install && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
